website_summaries.verdict: Boasting multiple settings and an innovative mechanism for superior precision, this premium salt and pepper grinder set delivers the perfect consistency, every time.
pros: Features a unique grinding mechanism to release fuller flavor and lids to keep contents fresh
Pepper grinder boasts a hardened carbon steel mechanism and offers 6 easy to adjust grinding levels, ranging from coarse to powder-fine
Salt mill features a diamond-cut ceramic grinder with 3 settings, and effortlessly takes on large, hard sea salt chunks
Acrylic and stainless steel construction beautifully balances elegance and durability
cons: Pricey, but the quality and performance is unrivaled

customer_reviews.title: High-priced low-quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this low-quality overprised product. It has many plastic parts and it is Made in China not England. The product description is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The King and Queen of the Kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I was so tired of buying those grinders that are made of plastic, and take quite a bit of turning to get the product out and on the food. These are more than I would normally pay for such a luxury, but I expect these to last for at least 20 years. There is nothing like freshly ground pepper and salt to enhance a meal's flavor.
customer_reviews.author: garb

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a cheep made item, poorly glued together for the $$ price we paid.
customer_reviews.text: Were excited about the purchase. Within 2 m of first use pepper shaker top stainless cap came apart, separated from the plastic core. Looked like a cheep made item, poorly glued together. Very disappointed especially since the $$ price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Very good salt and pepper mill set
customer_reviews.text: The Cole and Mason salt and pepper mill set was purchased because our other brand of mills could not grind fine. Especially the pepper would come out chunky that is objectionable to some. The new Derwent style mills grind very evenly and down to fine particles. They look better and perform better, so I consider it money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: justplainsteve

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Salt and Pepper Set
customer_reviews.text: The Cole & Mason set looks great on our counter and dispenses perfectly. Our previous grinders often failed to consistently dispenses, but that has not been the case with the Cole & Mason. We bought it with the custom wood base which effectively keeps loose grinds contained rather than letting them "float" on to the counter. Not sure why the plastic base is so much more expensive than the wood, but the wood is working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Yes to Derwent!
customer_reviews.text: I have several salt/pepper shakers and mills and the Cole & Mason Derwent Salt & Pepper set is excellent; the best so far. I like the tallness and the grip and twist works well, even for these "older" hands. Easy to fill. The box they arrived in was superfluous in my case, but if giving as a gift it would be impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Dee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in style and function
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and stylish s and p set. This would make a lovely gift. They both have adjustable grind sizes which allows easy changes depending on what you are making. The top is easy to twist and is very comfortable in your hand. And the tray they sit on looks gorgeous for the set.
customer_reviews.author: Jean A "Gramma"

customer_reviews.title: NOT glass; plastic. Not well made.  Not worth the money. Made in China.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I suspected that I would get a slick mill made of metal and glass. It's not. It's body is made of plastic. It should cost about $10, and is not worth a penny more. ATK reviewed this mill very well, but it is a sad day when a company can get away with making a pastic "toy", putting it in a fancy package and making it seem like it is more than it is. If I wanted plastic I would have gone to my local big box store. Shame on the management of Cole and Mason who put profits before their name and products.
customer_reviews.author: Worm Doc

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Several times the top has popped off when carrying the pepper grinder to the table, dumping peppercorns all over the floor and table. Just a really cheaply made product, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: First-Rate, First Class.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a set for a few years and this Christmas I gave away about a dozen of them as gifts; they were very well received. The adjustments are great. My only recommendation is that when you finish grinding on your food, turn them to the smallest setting so they lose as little as possible when you store them. You will also want a small ramakin or something under the salt grinder wherever you store it.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality construction
customer_reviews.text: The product has poor construction. The copper top pulls off the inner black plastic lining while trying to remove top and fill.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Strong Mildew Smell
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the company has the nerve to sell this product smelling the way it does. The mildew smell is overwhelming, like they were stored in a damp moldy basement that may have had water damage at some point. I thought it was just the box that they were packaged in, but it seems the smell has permeated into the S & P grinders themselves, as well as the contents they came filled with. I am so disappointed with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Copper color peeling off
customer_reviews.text: After a year the copper coating started peeling off. They only ever have gotten light use and I never did anything other than wipe them clean with a damp paper towel so there is no reason this should have happened. I have another set in the black metal look and have had them longer and did not have this happen. Those ones still look brand new. For the price I paid which was almost $100 back then I expected them to last much longer. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: price fluctuation left me feel scammed
customer_reviews.text: the moment i got it the price dropped by 30$. that makes me feel like the price was far from fair in the first place and that you sell overrated products. i could return it and re-buy it again, but the shipping price for me is 14.1$, and the return shipping price is 20$, so i will not benefit. anyway, i aimed to a better peppery and salty taste but due to this i also got a fair share of bitterness.
customer_reviews.author: yosef kitrossky

customer_reviews.title: A little on the expensive side but no salt rings left on counter or table
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set that i did not have to remove any covers from or flip upside down to get the salt and pepper. I bought a few cheaper sets but the salt always seemed to leave a round circle of sait on the table or counter top. These were more money than I wanted to spend but they are of nice quality and there is no salt ring left on the table or counter top.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Draper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for this price, they are made of plastic not glass.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality glass and metal salt and pepper grinder and somehow missed the fact that these are made with some form of plastic not glass. I don't want to use plastic products and cannot put plastic grinders on my stove as they can melt or deform when the oven is used. That's why I was buying a new set. Otherwise, they grind fine and I like the easy to use dial on the bottom to set grind level and the way they operate.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grinders
customer_reviews.text: I viewed these on an episode of Americas Test Kitchen and fell in love. Purchased these 3 months ago and they are perfect. Had a pair before these and they were total crap compared to these. They grind so finely...I am amazed. Get you a set. Easy to fill. Easy to clean. Beautiful to look at. I am so proud! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Salt grinder started seizing.
customer_reviews.text: Salt grinder started seizing up after a month of use (very difficult to grind); $80.00 waste. This has never happened to me before, even in my less expensive grinders! My apologies to the manufacturer. It was possibly moisture in the salt that caused it to seize. I just never had that happen before in any salt grinder I have owned. Works very well now. As manufacture states: Put a little uncooked white rice in the salt grinder to remove moisture if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Work well but expensive for what they are.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a pair of William Bounds mills that I've had for many years. I wanted something with more contemporary styling. I used coarse grain sea salt bought from a chef supply store and Costco black peppercorns. Refilling is easy. Selecting the grind size should be easy but for some reason I keep trying to twist the part that does not twist. They are a little difficult to keep clean and get sticky quite quickly. I think they are pricey for what they are but when looking at others (even highly reviewed items) it was difficult to tell what was good or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Geek

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought them 20 years ago !
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the $$$. Last year bought competitor Fletchers product. Beautiful wood but crappy works. To get a simple lifetime grinding mechanism replacement had to go to their president who was an arrogant a--. Upon opening my Cole Mason set knew by the weight alone This is quality!!! A great lifetime investment. Should have bought them 20 years ago. Thanks Cole and Mason.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Hasselbach

customer_reviews.title: Such elegant grinders - wish . . .
customer_reviews.text: These salt and pepper grinders have just been delivered to me and I found them elegant including the packaging. Additionally, these grinders offer multiple grinding options which is perfect for me. Also, the set surely makes a decent gift. However I found it a bit odd and not an elegant idea to have normal salt and pepper in the grinders instead of for instance the blend peppercorn just to promote such elegance further . . . and it would not have made a difference from pricing stand point for them. Finally, time will show how sturdy built since they are made/manufactured in china.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: appear used but bought new
customer_reviews.text: I received these without a problem, but they were half full and it shows them being full on picture. They should be full for the price. Also one of the seals was missing on bottom. Although I really like them and the color is perfect, I am disappointed that I bought getting new sets and these appear to have been used. Not sure if I'll go to the trouble of sending back simply because it took awhile to get them and they appear to work well. The quality is good. Just disappointing they appear to be used. So just beware of this company!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Yields a great amount of pepper/salt with a small twist
customer_reviews.text: These mills yield a significant amount of output pepper/salt with very little input/twist. Much better than any other manual or electric mills we’ve owned in the past (which have been many). These are priced great, come in a gift-able box and have an easy size adjustment mechanism. I highly recommend these mills. Note: Coke& Mason mill funnel in picture is not included in this kit. I purchased that separately (and don’t really recommend it).
customer_reviews.author: P120D1GY

customer_reviews.title: MILL You Still Love Me Tomorrow?  Ah-Choo!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sturdy, easy to use, and they offer a variety of grind sizes. Love these mills. Changing settings is simple. Grinding is a breeze. They deliver consistent sizes and amounts of salt/pepper bits every time. Yes, they are pricey. But once you actually have your hands on these, you'll understand why. High quality, versatile mills that are well-made. Not heavy, but they look like little shiny tanks. When something this well-made is in your kitchen, it just makes cooking that much more pleasurable and easy. These are a luxury, for sure, but a pretty great one. Excellent gift idea. BUY THESE MILLS. You won't be sorry. Especially if you cook often.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: America’s Home Test Kitchen winner
customer_reviews.text: These grinders won the “America’s Home Test Kitchen” pepper grinder test. I have had them at home for several years and they work great. They aren’t cheap but they are built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Perfect grinders!!
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing some beautiful hand-painted grinders that looked good but were apallingly ineffective at grinding. I finally went to a kitchen store and tried several high end grinders. These Cole & Mason mills are the best grinders I have ever found in my life, hands-down! They are perfectly uniform in their cutting. Theyre easy to fill, easy to twist. Fantastic. I went home and ordered them on Amazon. Now I will always have the right amount of salt and pepper in my cooking! They are adjustable in terms of grind size. I will never need to use anything else but a set of Cole & Mason salt & pepper mills!
customer_reviews.author: POP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We've had our set of salt and pepper mills for about six months. We love them! Absolutely no issues. There's not a whole lot to say: These put out significantly more quantity than our last (relatively inexpensive) set, which is awesome. Consequently we do fill them more often, but not overmuch, maybe once every couple or three months. I do use them (briskly) over steaming pots and pans quite often, and so far no jams, but I wouldn't push that one too far. (The product could hardly be faulted for elementary physics: steam + salt = mush.) Anyway, I'm so pleased that I'm thinking about getting a few more salt mills. Obviously, I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: The salt and pepper grinders are beautiful, but useless (to me). If you have the arms of Arnold, you might like them, but I need a wrench to turn the grinders. Very hard to turn the grinders. If you are able to crank the grinder, a large amount of product is produced in a burst. My hands aren't that strong. This was a waste of money for me, they are going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent consistent grinding
customer_reviews.text: I love these grinders. I get a good volume of ground salt/pepper with consistent coarseness and good range of adjustment. The adjustment ring has a discretely labeled scale, so you can see your setting. The adjustment ring is a bit unintuitive which part you need to turn, but that’s a minor inconvenience for the grind quality. I tried 3-4 cheap grinders before and this one is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: They earn a grade of a solid B
customer_reviews.text: These function well so far but are much less impressive in person than I expected from the description. Somehow, the plexiglass is more plasticky than I expected, and they’re smaller and not the kitchen counter statement I was hoping for. Let’s hope they continue to grind as well as they do now. (Also, it was easy to adjust the coarseness of the grind)
customer_reviews.author: Osa

customer_reviews.title: The ease of turning.
customer_reviews.text: My sister had a set. They are well made and worth the extra money over others I’ve tried. You can set the size of the coarseness of the salt and pepper. But the most important thing to me was the ease of turning the grinder. With arthritis this means a lot to me.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: I love these mills
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been through several other salt and pepper mills that broke, both manual and battery powered. I decided to invest the money in these and I’m glad. They look beautiful (copper color) and they work well and have held up well. I like that you can adjust the size of the salt, and even more choices on the size of the pepper pieces. The pepper does seem more flavorful coming out of this mill than others I’ve had. I really like these a lot. They are expensive but worth it. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Vienne Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These are the biggest pieces of junk I've owned in a while. Took them apart by removing the screw on the bottom to clean and was never able to get it back together. literally just threw them in the garbage. Absolutely ridiculous!!!! $50 down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Tom Selman

customer_reviews.title: They work very well and are very nice looking. If the container was glass
customer_reviews.text: We have been very impressed with this set. They work very well and are very nice looking. If the container was glass, I would be happy to give the full 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: High quality product, even grinding, attractive and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as tool for the table as I prefer my pepper fresh ground. The adjustments are very intuitive and grinds are very even. Construction is very solid but don’t drop them on the tile as they have a lot of parts that can break. I would purchase these again as they work wonderfully. The pepper grinder especially, I put a heavy layer of pepper on a 16 lb brisket and never felt fatigued or strained with this particular grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Randy T Berg

customer_reviews.title: Nice Salt and pepper grinders, love the copper hue of the top and bottom metallic bands
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of spice grinders for salt and pepper. The tops just pull off with a firm tug for refilling, time will tell if they will loosen and become unusable but for now they are pretty and work really nicely. Ceramic mill grinder for salt to limit wear is nice, stainless steel grinding mechanism for the pepper.
customer_reviews.author: David T. LaFrance

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: We've finally found a decent pepper grinder! Didn't really need the salt grinder but it makes a really nice set. Well worth the extra cost (we were spending $20 or so on lousy pepper grinders). Different levels of pepper works great. My husband likes big chunks while I'm more of a fine pepper person. We both love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katliz

customer_reviews.title: Nice, But Not Lifechanging
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on the recommendation of Cook's Illustrated. I am an amateur cook and have been learning the utility of freshly ground spices. While I would agree with Cook's Illustrated that the device is well-made, easy to use, and provides a wide range of grinding levels, I was expecting more of the structure for the price. Under the brushed steel, it's just plastic. It also can be a bit hard to open up. Nonetheless, it is a nice addition to our kitchen and, for those who entertain, it definitely provides an aesthetically appealing and professional panache.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This set was a gift for my daughter-in-law. They are very attractive and the ability to select how fine the salt and pepper can be ground is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Susan U Seglem

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The salt and pepper grinders are easy to use and the blades are sharp. I have had to recognize that dispensing of salt and pepper are much more rapid with these grinders compared to my old grinders
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice, poor quality control on both, next to impossible to turn pepper.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was just a fluke that on the first set I ordered, the pepper grinder would not turn. Even after the pepper was removed, the top would not rotate. I checked any and all setting, adjustments to no avail. After the second set was received, only to have the same problem, I am done. Very poor quality control for a very expensive "high end" item. The salt worked flawlessly in both packages... but not on the pepper. Had to return both and go another direction.
customer_reviews.author: victoria knight

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are quality mills. We gave them as a gift to our parents a fre months ago and enjoy using them at their table on visits. They are easy to fill, grind beautifully , easy operation for arthritic hands, and come bea beautifully boxed for gifting. The adjustable grind feature works very well. Also bought them for a brother and sister-in-law because we were so pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Salt and Pepper
customer_reviews.text: These are nice salt and pepper grinders. I took off one star because it says they come with salt and peppercorns but both are a little less then half-way filled. For the price of these could they not have spent a cent or two to fill these completely?
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set!
customer_reviews.text: These mills are worth the price of admission. They are quality made and function very well. The grind is very consistent and operates smoothly. Good looks and great function. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a good set of mills for their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: ETHAN

customer_reviews.title: Spice up your life
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I cannot get over how easy the salt and pepper grinders work and how terrific they look. We find ourselves constantly using both--something we hardly ever did before, especially a pepper grinder. A truly wonderful item for every kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This is the best peppermill in the world, but if you order it from Amazon, you'll never get it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon just slapped a shipping on the Cole packaging which is a real neat box that is held closed with a magnet. Unfortunately, since that is all that was holding it closed, both the salt and pepper mill didn't make it to me, just the box.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingRon

customer_reviews.title: I never had it so good!
customer_reviews.text: This grinder set I found to be well worth the money. From it's packaging to the dinner table, this has been a great purchase for myself. My last grinder set there was very little variable between the fine and coarse settings. This set delivers! I was most impressed with the superfine setting. Both the salt and the pepper topped the servings with a pollen like film over the dishes. Talk about super-granular, wow! The coarse setting was equally beneficial for my grilled tuna steaks. If you're ever on the fence about a salt & pepper grinder set, this will not let you down. I give it 6 stars!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: They actually work as you would expect and are of high quality
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different grinders over many years and these are the first ones to actually work as you would expect. They are of high quality construction and have a great feel of quality. Fit in the hand comfortably and are easy to use and fill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and operate quite well
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a very old set of grinders and for some reason bought a cheap set that only lasted a few months. I read the reviews on these Cole & Mason salt and pepper grinders and though more expensive still a good price. I’ve had them now for about a month and am very pleased. Both salt and pepper grinders operate very well and the copper set is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: lexigirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looks and operation
customer_reviews.text: Not only are they pretty, they operate so super. Adjustable grinds on both items. They are so much better in operation than the ones I've had in the past. Great packaging too. Makes a great gift you will be proud to give anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Jaeckels

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable grinds are great
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a good looking box and works like a dream. The pepper grinder can get to a really fine grind (which I prefer) as well as a corse grind. Easy to use. They come pre-filled with the salt and pepper. Very Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eyeguys

customer_reviews.title: the pepper is not near as chunky as I would like. Other than that they are good to look at
customer_reviews.text: When set to the most course grind, the pepper is not near as chunky as I would like. Other than that they are okay Update over time it got really tiresome to use these grinders, as the adjustments were nowhere near adequate for producing a course grind. They look good but do not produce up to expectation
customer_reviews.author: chriis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are everything I could have asked for in salt and pepper mills. I was expecting a coarser grind on the coarsest pepper setting, but oh well. The fine is really fine, the units trend precision fine like fairy dust; so, if I prefer a larger, rustic cracked peppercorn for applications, I'll rough mortar it myself. Oddly, the salt has more grind variation from chalk fine to salt caramel coarse with just 3 settings. I'm thinking my 4 peppercorn medley is soft and my Hawaiian red clay alaea salt is hard? This is an attractive table use set. Easy to operate, simple to fill. A fresh flavor sensation. I think this will make an excellent gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Girl_stuff

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt feel cheaply made, has a nice weight to it. Havnt had to clean yet so not sure how that will go. Lowest setting is very nice. The salt and pepper grinding is comparable to powedered sugar. Have to unscrew tiny screws to refill. Comes with peppercorn in it and white table salt. Color is vibrant and true to photo. The packaging feels and looks high end. Would make for a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: pepper mill barely works
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year use, the pepper mill barely works. I tried cleaning, doesn't do much. Strange, considering that it's metal... Salt mill is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mick H

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these twice as gifts, they were so well-received BOTH times that even though I was the giver, I had a moment when they were being opened that I thought, "Wow they look so nice.....should've kept them for myself!". I definitely need to order a set just for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette S.

customer_reviews.title: These are 7.5" NOT 6" as described but guy them anyway
customer_reviews.text: The grind on these is very good and they look nice. Adjustment of grind size is also good. The materials and workmanship appear to be very good. I love that these fill from the top; just pull the top off and fill them. There is no need to invert or other messy issues. The only problem is that these are larger than advertised. These are 7.5" tall, not 6", so they are a little large for the table. I really wish that they were smaller but not so much that I will return them. If you can live with the larger size, I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: John Zornes

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice packaging! It would make a really nice gift and I would gift! Easy to fill! Easy to use! Multiple grind options! Great looking!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Best pepper grinder ever
customer_reviews.text: I started with a pepper grinder and liked it so much I purchased a set for myself and friends. The pepper grinder is easily adjustable and produces more pepper with fewer twists than any other grinder I have tried, including Peugeot. Both grinders are easy to fill. Plus the design is really attractive.
customer_reviews.author: RTW

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through so many sets of grinders. They always break, or the design of them makes them difficult to use over time. So far these are perfect. They look great. The design makes them very easy to use, and they seem as though they will last a very long time. I also love that you can choose the coarseness
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I went through many salt and pepper grinders before I bought these and I love them! I only wish I would have bought these first. A little pricey, but the quality is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: KLovesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Peugeot grinder that lasted 10 years. Pleased with functionality / good size - seems to be good quality. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: When I first looked at these, I was concerned about the high price. When I read the description "last grinders you will ever buy" because of the guarantee. Since I had bought several lower price sets, it made sense. Months later, I am so glad I did! High quality, easy to fill, easy to adjust the grind. I am thrilled with these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barry

customer_reviews.title: I've bought three....
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. So much that I have bought two other sets as gifts. Classic looks. refills easily. Grinds as expected. They are a bit spendy for what they are, but not so overpriced that it kept me from buying three sets.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Grinds much better than my previous set!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the adjustable grind nice on these, but they produce much more ground salt/pepper per "twist" than my previous set did. I do wish that these were glass instead of plastic, but overall I'm very happy with these. Could do without the fancy gift box.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Best Grinders I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Worth the cost, my old grinders would eventually all break due to plastic components inside, these have worked flawlessly so far and grind nicely with multiple settings, they look nice also. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sun Diego Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my nephew who is a newlywed and loves to cook but wanted something a little bit fancy to use in the kitchen. He loved them! They are really quality grinders and come in a really nice gift box. Super classy! And the price for the set was what they were selling them for individually in a gourmet grocery store near me. I will probably end up getting some for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen accessories
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek looking, can be used for formal or casual table setting. Easy to fill and use. Haven’t tried to clean yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Precision Tools in every sense
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by America's Test Kitchen and with good reason: very well made, good weight and heft, and stylish in a clean way -- "precision tools" in every sense. Salt has fewer settings than the pepper mill but doesn't really need more, you'll be pleased with the level of control.

product_meta.title: COLE & MASON Derwent Salt and Pepper Grinder Set - Stainless Steel Mills Include Gift Box, Gourmet Precision Mechanisms and Premium Sea Salt and Peppercorns
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelThe Cole & Mason 7.5 inch Derwent Gourmet Precision Salt and Pepper Mill Set in stainless steel brings a modern style to your table with a sleek acrylic hourglass display. Pepper mills use premium hardened carbon steel millworks to bring user-friendly spice control to your table with six distinct settings, from fine powders to coarsely sliced and ground gourmet chunks. The salt mills use premium diamond-cut ceramic millworks to bring user-friendly spice control to your table with three distinct settings, from fine grains to coarsely ground gourmet chunks with even hard large-grained artisan sea salts. The Derwent salt and pepper grinder set is easy to refill by just lifting the top straight up and the grinding mechanism is also guaranteed for life. The custom gift box makes a perfect wedding, Christmas or house warming gift. Style, durability and dependability have been built into every Cole & Mason product since 1919 using the best materials and mechanisms; our products have been well-regarded by professional cooks and homemakers ever since. Count on Cole & Mason to give your table salt and pepper grinder set a touch of class!
feature_bullets: Modern and Unique Style: The high-quality clear acrylic salt and pepper mills with a stylish stainless-steel finish will look cool on any kitchen table
Adjustable Settings: Up to 6 precise grinding levels that offer fine or coarse granules, while a new durable top design creates a smooth and even turn to grind your salt and pepper
Maintain Freshness: Keep your favorite ground spices fresh and away from moisture and dust with one of the best salt and pepper mill grinders

Easily Refillable: The clear acrylic shaker body highlights the level of your spice and is easy to refill, simply pull up on the salt or pepper grinder top and refill with your choice of coarse sea salt and peppercorns
Lifetime Mechanism : Instead of crushing the salt and pepper, the Professional Gourmet Precision Mechanism strips them down by their individual layers as it grinds, releasing maximum flavor
